Summary: Travling east bound in southern South Dakota on HWY 46 , it was alittle foggy , I witnessed a large oval shaped object traveling very slowly south bound , metallic an no lights an no noise
divs: sighting detailsi am a truck driver and was traveling south on hwy 81, after turning east on hwy 46, i noticed something in front of me--maybe 200 ft off the ground traveling south bound very slowly, but very very large,there were no visable lights an ther was no noise that i could hear. it was foggy in layers and in and out of my veiw. it was metallic in color. it was so large i could not see how tall it was. i could veiw i think the bottom portion of the object. i could see the curve 0f the bottom only. as it travled south i could see it was extremely long, maybe the length of a football field. when i first saw it i was probably 1\2 to 3\4 mile from the object. by the time i reached it it had already crossed the hwy and my headlights were no longer able to light the object. i was very curious about it and tried to speed towards it as fast as i could. but could not get close enough fast enough to get a better view. almost looked like the bottom half of a 747 jet liner. after the object was out of sight was when reality hit me and i did get very frightened of what i saw. i proceeded east to the first truck stop which was outside of beresford, south dakota where i stopped and went inside. i inqired at the fuel desk if anyone had reported anything in the sky. the man looked at me as if i was crazy as i told him what i had seen. i was physically shaken. this was 19 years ago and this is the first time i have reported this incident to anyone. i also have 3 photos of a ufo my sister found in an antique store that she stopped at in winner,south dakota. she inspected a dresser and an taped to the underside of one of the drawers was several pictures of a ufo. there were no dates on these pictures,but looked to be from the 50's or 60's. she gave me only 3 pictures, which i still have today.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Beresford
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
